resume.title: Fullstack Web Developer
resume.summery:
Highly skilled and versatile web developer with a strong passion for creating user-friendly and innovative web applications. With 5 years of experience in both frontend and backend development, I possess a comprehensive understanding of the full software development lifecycle. I am adept at utilizing cutting-edge technologies, such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, NextJS, VueJS, PHP, Laravel, and Livewire, to deliver robust and efficient solutions.

Throughout my career, I have demonstrated a track record of delivering high-quality projects that meet client requirements and exceed expectations. I excel at collaborating with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless integration between frontend and backend systems, while prioritizing performance, functionality, and user experience. Additionally, my expertise extends to mobile app development using React-Native and proficient server management using GitHub Actions, cPanel, Vercel, Heroku, and Digital Ocean.

With a strong attention to detail and a commitment to continuous learning, I thrive in dynamic and fast-paced environments. I am eager to leverage my skills and experience to contribute to the success of Bitfumes, while further expanding my technical expertise.

Please note that this introduction can be customized to align with your specific skills, experience, and career goals. It should serve as a concise and compelling summary that captures the attention of potential employers and highlights your unique value proposition.

projects.name: Engaged in the development of mezohub.com
projects.description:
- Advocate for Test-Driven Development (TDD) to ensure codebase stability and reliability.

- Spearhead migration of front-end architecture from NextJS to Laravel, Inertia, and React monolithic app, reducing reliance on NextJS.

- Collaborate with UI/UX designer to transform Figma designs into Tailwind CSS and React components.

- Contribute to server management scripting, database operations, RESTful API development, socket implementation, Redis cache configuration, Laravel queue optimization, email handling, and Laravel job execution on the backend.

- Actively participate in code and PR reviews, maintaining high-quality standards and sharing insights with the team.

These bullet points summarize your various technical responsibilities and achievements within the mezohub.com development team, highlighting your expertise in TDD, front-end migration, UI/UX collaboration, backend development, and code review processes.

projects.name: Documentation for mezohub.com
projects.description:
- Contributed to the development and documentation of mezohub.com, a platform dedicated to server management and application deployment.

- Assisted in creating comprehensive and user-friendly documentation, including written instructions, visual aids, and examples, in close collaboration with the development team.

- Interacted with users to gather feedback and ensure the documentation remained up-to-date and aligned with their needs.

- Aimed to empower users by providing clear instructions, facilitating efficient server management and application deployment through mezohub.com.

projects.name: Open-Source Contribution (https://reactplay.io/)
projects.description:
- Actively involved in the development and revamping of the event page for the React Play Activity website as an open-source contributor.

- Collaborating with the existing maintainer team to simplify and enhance the codebase, eliminating complex and overengineered sections.

- Working with the GraphQL API and leveraging NextJS's server-side rendering functionalities (getServerProps and getStaticProps) to fetch data from the database and create a static site.

- Utilizing NextJS Image components to optimize image handling throughout the website.

- Streamlining the code and improving its readability to enhance maintainability and facilitate engagement and understanding for future contributors.

- Emphasizing the development of a well-structured codebase and enforcing consistent coding standards.

- Building a solid foundation for the event page of the React Play Activity website, welcoming contributions, and fostering efficient collaboration among developers.

projects.name: Creating and maintaining an online examination platform
projects.description: Our team constructed this online examination platform from the ground up. This app is divided into three sections: the Laravel RESTful API, the NextJS frontend, and a Vue.JS admin panel. The site is mobile-friendly and SEO-friendly. My work included designing a new user interface for the entire site, including an examination, an analytics section, and a student dashboard. Create charts to allow students to track their progress. I started with React context and then moved on to Redux state management. I also added a blog section, comment and like buttons, and an admin section to manage the blog.

activities.title: Participating Showwcase Hackerfest 2023

activities.title: Auditing Meta Front-End Developer Professional Certificate
activities.description: Auditing the Meta Front-End Developer Professional Certificate course and revisiting and gaining knowledge about more advanced React and web development technologies can be a great way to enhance your skills and stay updated in the field of front-end development.
